subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Cameron and Adrian Gonzalez hit two-run homers during an 11-run first inning against Jason Jennings yesterday in an 18-11 victory against the Houston Astros. Visiting San Diego had a season-high 19 hits on the day the Padres’ career hits leader, Tony Gwynn, was inducted into the Hall of Fame.
